text: Sir William Gillilan Johnson (1808 – 9 April 1886) was an Irish Conservative politician and barrister. He was elected Conservative MP for at the 1841 general election but unseated in August 1842. He was also Mayor of Belfast City Council in 1849. ==References== ==External links== * Category:UK MPs 1841–1847 Category:Irish Conservative Party MPs Category:1808 births Category:1886 deaths
title: William Gillilan Johnson
